docs.lead_paragraph: Bronx-Lebanon Hospital Center described the inaccurate tests as “isolated incidents” that took place over an eight-month period.

headline.seo: New Blood Tests for 920 Bronx-Lebanon Hospital Patients After Errors
headline.main: New Blood Tests for 920 Patients After Six Samples Were Mislabeled
headline.print_headline: New Blood Tests for 920 Patients After Six Samples Were Mislabeled
